ARABIC: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They have misguided many people. Do not increase the wrongdoers in anything but misguidance!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And they misled many. So do not give the evil-doers increase but in error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They have misled many. So do not enable these evildoers to increase in anything except straying (from the Right Way).”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They have misled many and the unjust will achieve nothing but more error".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And they have misled a large number; and (I pray that) You increase nothing for the unjust except error.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed they have led many astray. And (O Allah): `Grant no increase to the wrongdoers save error."'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And indeed they have led astray many, and do not increase the unjust in aught but error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And they have led many astray. Increase Thou not the evildoers save in error!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they have led many astray, and Thou increasest the wrong-doers in naught save error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They have led many astray; so lead the wrongdoers to further error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And surely they have misled many. And increase Thou these wrong-doers in naught save error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and already they have led many astray. Do not increase the wrongdoers in anything but error.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They have already misled many; and grant Thou no increase to the wrong-doers but in straying (from their mark)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed they have led many astray. And (O Allah): 'Grant no increase to the Zalimun (polytheists, wrong-doers, and disbelievers, etc.) save error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And they have led many astray. (Noah supplicated saying): 'Allah, do not increase the harmdoers except in error'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They have misled many, so do not increase the wrongdoers except in confusion.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:24] And they have certainly led astray, by these [gods], many, people, by commanding them to worship them. And do not [O God] increase the evildoers except in error!’ (wa-lā tazidi’l-zālimīna illā dalālan is a supplement to qad adallū, ‘they have certainly led astray’): He [Noah] invoked God against them when it was revealed to him that, ‘None of your people will believe except he who has already believed’ [Q. 11:36].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 698 (And they have led many astray) he says: they have misled through them many people; and it is also said: many people went astray because of them, (and Thou increasest the wrong-doers) the disbelievers and idolaters in their worship of these idols (in naught save error) loss and destruction.
